brainly_data.question: What process best explains the astounding variety of dogs at a dog show? A. hybridization B. asexual reproduction C. selective breeding D. genetic engineering
brainly_data.subject: Chemistry

all_answers.question: What process best explains the astounding variety of dogs at a dog show? A. hybridization B. asexual reproduction C. selective breeding D. genetic engineering
all_answers.subject: Chemistry
all_answers.text: The answer to your question is C. They selectively breed dogs for dog shows to have a more appealing outcome.
